content: सांपराय {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (यी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Relating to war, warlike. {@--2@} Relating to the other world, future. --यः, --यं {@--1@} Conflict, contention. {@--2@} Future life, the future. {@--3@} The means of attaining the future world. {@--4@} Inquiry into the future. {@--5@} Inquiry, investigation. {@--6@} Uncertainty.
